y, combining `XCREW.MLOG$_CHANGE_OF_DUTY.TLC`, `XCREW.MLOG$_CHANGE_OF_BEGIN_DATE`, `XCREW.MLOG$_CHANGE_OF_DUTY.BEGIN_TIME`, `XCREW.MLOG$_CHANGE_OF_DUTY.TYPE`, `XCREW.MLOG$_CHANGE_OF_DUTY.HOSTNAME` and `XCREW.MLOG$_CHANGE_OF_DUTY.PID` fields. * Insert and update operations are carried out using Unique Key. * No delete operation is performed; instead, `status`(see Mapping for details) is updated based on the retrieved data. ### Mapping |Model Attribute|Source Table|Source Field|Detail| |:----|:----|:----|:----| |extraInfo| | | | |crewId|**Tracking Released Notification:**
